MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Garden City, affecting properties in  Kingsley Road, Sealand Avenue and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:55PM on 20th January 2021.
